modules.name: PhantomJS.File
modules.comments:
This module defines types and functions for working with files.
The following file modes are currently available:

R  - read       - don't create file if not exists
RW - read+write - don't create fuke if not exists, truncate existing text
W  - write      - create if not exists, truncate existing text
A  - append     - create if not exists, append to existing text

declarations.comments: File modes for opening a file.  Read, Write, Append, Read-Write
declarations.title: FileMode

declarations.comments:
Used to convert a FileMode to a foreign type
that can be passed into native phantomjs functions.
declarations.title: toForeignFileMode

declarations.comments: The type of image format when rendering a screenshot
declarations.title: RenderFormat

declarations.comments: The type and quality of a rendered screenshot
declarations.title: RenderSettings

declarations.comments: Predefined setting for rendering screenshot as jpeg
declarations.title: jpeg

declarations.comments: Predefined setting for rendering screenshot as png
declarations.title: png

declarations.comments: The type of a PhantomJS page context.
declarations.title: Page

declarations.comments: Creates a new page context.
declarations.title: createPage

declarations.comments:
Sets custom headers on a page context.  These headers will persist
for the life of the context.
declarations.title: customHeadersRaw

declarations.comments: Opens a URL in a page context.
declarations.title: open

declarations.comments: Renders a screenshot of the given page.
declarations.title: render

declarations.comments: Injects a javascript file into a page.
declarations.title: injectJs

declarations.comments:
Evaluates a specific function on the window object of the page.
When using this function you will need to add a type annotation so
PureScript knows what type the native javascript will return, e.g.

`result <- evaluate page "file.js" :: forall e. Aff e (Array String)`
declarations.title: evaluate

modules.name: PhantomJS.Stream
modules.comments: This module defines types and functions for working with file streams.

declarations.comments: The filemode and character set settings needed to open a stream.
declarations.title: StreamSettings

declarations.comments: Helper for creating a StreamSettings type
declarations.title: withSettings

declarations.comments: Open a file stream
declarations.title: open

declarations.comments: Write to a file stream
declarations.title: write

declarations.comments: Write a line to a file stream
declarations.title: writeLine

declarations.comments: Read a line from a file stream
declarations.title: readLine

declarations.comments: Read the entire stream
declarations.title: read

declarations.comments: Close a file stream
declarations.title: close

declarations.comments:
Get the architecture, name, and version of the
operating system.
declarations.title: os

declarations.comments:
fold over the keys and values of the system environment variables.
First parameter is key, second is value
declarations.title: foldEnv

declarations.comments: The PID (Process ID) for the currently executing PhantomJS process.
declarations.title: pid
